name: Grandpa Knight
description:
Grandpa Knight.
Submission for the Metroidvania  Month 16.

Support for both PC and Xbox Controller (if available)

PC Controller:

[A][D] Move left/Right

[Spacebar] Jump

[R] Slow motion

[Shift] Run

[E] Meele Attack

[F] Range Attack

[S] Save when available

Xbox Controller

[Thumbstick/D-Pad] Move left/Right

[A] Jump

[B] Slow motion

[X] Meele Attack

[Y] Range Attack

[Right Shoulder (RB)] Save when available
